import React, { useState } from "react"; import contactImage from "../Images/image1.png"; import "../Css/Contact.css"; const Contact = () => { const {PhoneNumber, setPhoneNumber} = useState(''); const {valid, setValid}= useState(true); const handleChange=(event)=>{ const input=event.target.value; setPhoneNumber(input); setValid(validatePhoneNumber(input)); } const validatePhoneNumber=(PhoneNumber)=>{ const phoneNumberPattern= /^\d(10)$/; return phoneNumberPattern.test(PhoneNumber); } return ( <>

We'd love to hear from you.

Our friendly team is always here to chat.

}
); }; export default Contact;
